app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Trim Chat
app_description: Trim Chat the minimalist messaging app is designed for short lived exchanges without the use of personal contact details like phone number social media account or contact list. As messages reach an age threshold they are automatically deleted. If an inactive chat drops to zero messages it too is deleted. Always trim your list of chats contains only those most active and relevant. FEATURES Private no phone number social media account contact list advertising or tracking Simple connect with QR code or expiring link Secure end to end encryption Trim automatic removal of inactive conversations GET STARTED IN 3 STEPS 1. Enter your name. 2. Create a trim chat with just a title. 3. Invite others to your trim chat via QR code or expiring link. USE CASES New untrusted or temporary contacts connect without exposing your contact details by scanning a QR code 3rd party coordination connect your contacts with each other without exposing their contact details by sharing an expiring link Short lived topics with your existing contacts create lightweight topical trim chats by sharing an expiring link THEMES Choose from a variety of color themes!
